page.title: 08FORESTRY CONTINUED
page.content: Delamere/Eddisbury {FORESTRY CONTINUED} The forestry commission have a large nursery in the forest & four to five million plants are produced annually for use in forestry commission forests all over Britain.Old Pale Nursery is located in the south eastern part of the forest,near the railway station. The main production is of pine & spruce in polyhouses,about 300000 seedlings are produced each year for planting in the drier sandier forests. 500000 rooted cuttings are produced from Old Pale's ten polyhouses each year. The animal life of the forest is dependant on the vegetation.In the more open areas the ferns dominate, brackens & broad buckler fern also. There are bluebells,wood sorrell & creeping soft grass too.
